item.title: Its Monday What Are You Reading #1 + Weekly Recap
item.description: BookDate has a weekly running event where we all post what we’re reading this week! What I read Last Week I finally finished reading David Allen’s Getting Things Done! I’ve always heard about the infamous GTD method and finally decided to read the book. I am not sure if I want to write a review for it yet because I can’t really judge how well the process works before I actually implement it.
